query: Q1. Some of your data in Column C is displaying as hashtags (
options:
Right-click column C, select Format Cells, and then select Best-Fit.
 Right-click column C and select Best-Fit.
 Double-click column C.
 Double-click the vertical boundary between columns C and D.

query: Q2. Which two functions check for the presence of numerical or nonnumerical characters in cells?
options:
ISNUMBER and ISTEXT
 ISNUMBER and ISALPHA
 ISVALUE AND ISNUMBER
 ISVALUE and ISTEXT

query: Q4. If cell A3 contains the text THE DEATH OF CHIVALRY, what will the function =PROPER(A3) return?
options:
the death of chivalry
 The death of Chivalry
 THE DEATH OF CHIVALRY
 The Death Of Chivalry

query: Q6. When editing a cell, what do you press to cycle between relative, mixed, and absolute cell references?
options:
Alt+F4 (Windows) or Option+F4 (Mac)
 Alt+Shift+4 (Windows) or Option+Shift+4 (Mac)
 Ctrl+Shift+4 (Windows) or Command+Shift+4 (Mac)
 the F4 (Windows) or Command+T (Mac)

query: Q7. You need to add a line chart showing a sales trends over the last 12 months and you have only a little space to work with. How can you convey the required information within a single cell?
options:
Add an image of the chart to a comment.
 Add a hyperlink to another worksheet that displays a chart when clicked.
 Add an image of the chart to the worksheet.
 Add a sparkline, a graphic that summarizes data visually within a single worksheet cell.

query: Q8. What is the best way to activate the Excel Help system?
options:
Right-click anywhere and select Help.
 Press F1 or click the Help tab in the ribbon.
 Press F10.
 all of these answers.

query: Q10. When using Goal Seek, you can find a target result by varying \_ at most.
options:
three inputs
 four inputs
 two inputs
 one input

query: Q12. A cell contains the value 7.877 and you want it to display as 7.9. How can you accomplish this?
options:
Use the ROUND() function.
 Click the Decrease Decimal button twice.
 In the cells group on the Home tab, click Format > Format Cells. Then click the Alignment tab and select Right Indent.
 Click the Decrease Decimal button once.

query: Q13. Which formula is NOT equivalent to all of the others?
options:
=A3+A4+A5+A6
 =SUM(A3:A6)
 =SUM(A3,A6)
 =SUM(A3,A4,A5,A6)

query: Q14. Which custom format will make the cells in column A appear like the corresponding cells in column B?
options:
MMM-YYYY
 MMMM-YYYY
 MMMM&"-"&YYYY
 M-YYYY

query: Q15. Which function returns a reference to a cell (or cell range) that is a specified distance from a base cell?
options:
OFFSET
 VLOOKUP
 INDEX
 MATCH

query: Q16. You're working with columns whose width and font-size should not be changed. Yet the columns are too narrow to display all the text in each cell. What tool should you use to solve the problem?
options:
Sparklines
 Wrap Text
 Fill Handle
 Centered Alignment

query: Q17. Of the four chart types listed, which works best for summarizing time-based data?
options:
pie chart
 line chart
 XY scatter chart
 bar chart

query: Q20. To ensure shapes and other objects are an equal left-to-right distance apart, select the shapes, click Page Layout > Align, and then click \_.
options:
Align Middle
 Distribute Horizontally
 Distribute Vertically
 Align Center

query: Q21. An organization chart, which shows the hierarchy within a company or organization, is available as \_ that is included with Excel.
options:
a 3D model
 SmartArt
 a Treemap chart
 a drawing object

query: Q22. You want to be able to restrict values allowed in a cell and need to create a drop-down list of values from which users can choose. Which feature should you use?
options:
Protect Worksheet
 Conditional Formatting
 Allow Users to Edit Ranges
 Data Validation

query: Q23. To round up a value to the nearest increment of your choice, such as the next five cents, what function should you use?
options:
ROUNDUP
 MAX
 ROUND
 CEILING

query: Q24. Which function returns the largest value amongst all values within the range H2:H30?
options:
=MAX(H2:H30)
 =MAXIMUM(H2:H30)
 =LARGE(H2:H30,29)
 =UPPER(H2:H30,1)

query: Q25. Which chart type can display two different data series as a different series type within the same chart?
options:
XY chart
 clustered column
 bubble chart
 combo chart

query: Q27. Which formula returns the value in cell A1 of the worksheet named MySheet?
options:
=MySheet!A1
 =MySheet_A1
 =MySheet&A1
 =MySheet@A1

query: Q29. Which formula correctly counts the number of numeric values in both B4:E4 and G4:I4?
options:
=COUNT(B4:E4&G4:I4)
 =COUNT(B4:E4,G4:I4)
 =COUNT(B4:E4 G4:I4)
 =COUNT(B4:I4)

query: Q30. After activating a chart, which sequence adds a trendline to the chart?
options:
In the Format group, select Trendline from the Insert Shapes list.
 Click outside the plot area and select Add Trendline
 Click inside the plot and select Forecast.
 Right-click a data series and select Add Trendline.

query: Q31. Which Excel add-in will help you find a target result by varying multiple inputs to a formula?
options:
Goal Seek
 Power Pivot
 Data Analysis
 Solver

query: Q32. What tool would you use to prevent the input in a cell of a date outside a specific range?
options:
Protect Workbook
 Watch Window
 Data Validation
 Filter
